indicator_name: 질서 있고 안전하고 정기적이고 책임 있는 이주와 이동성을 촉진하는 이주정책을 갖춘 국가의 수
target_name: 안전하고, 정기적이고, 책임 있는 인구의 이주 및 이동이 가능하도록 잘 관리된 이민정책 수립 및 이행

en.title: Number of countries that have implemented well-managed migration policies
en.indicator_name: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
en.target: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 564kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
